{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ஒளிச் சேர்க்கையின் போது கிரானாவில் ADP + Pi \\rightarrow ATP ஆக  உற்பத்தி செய்வது. 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பாஸ்பரிகரணம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1980"},{"text":"

ஒளி பாஸ்பரிகரணம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1981"},{"text":"

ஆக்ஸிஜனேற்ற பாஸ்பரிகரணம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3013"},{"text":"

ஒளி பிளத்தல்
